name: Alone In The Dark (DragonBean)
description:
This Game is a submission for Trijam#191, made in 3 hours(times except build games and making this page.) if there is problem with resoltion in chrome ,  I strongly recommand you to play with edge browser..

You are Isolated alone in the dark.

Protect yourself from enemies coming from the dark!

sprites by myself, 

bgm from  https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack
